import React from "react"; import ModalWithForm from "../ModalWithForm/ModalWithForm"; import "../ModalWithForm/ModalWithForm.css"; import { useForm } from "../../hooks/useForm"; const AddItemModal = ({ onClose, onAddItem, isOpen }) => { const { values, handleChange } = useForm({ name: "", imageUrl: "", weather: "", }); const formInfo = { title: "New Garment", name: "create", buttonText: "Add garment", }; return (
); }; export default AddItemModal;
